ISSUE.TITLE: ShipStation Plugin - Bug with Content-Type
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Steps to reproduce the problem: I installed a new instance of nopCommerce 4.50 and configured ShipStation. I tested and confirmed the ShipStation connection. On step 3 (Shipping Method) of checkout, the following error message is displayed and logged. Misused header name, 'Content-Type'. Make sure request headers are used with HttpRequestMessage, response headers with HttpResponseMessage, and content headers with HttpContent objects. See more details in this [post](https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/93171/shipstation-plugin-bug).
